name: coroot-mcp
description: Community MCP server that exposes Coroot root-cause analysis and incident context as tools for assistants (not an official Coroot product).

tools.name: get_deployments_overview
tools.description: Returns an overview of recent deployments and their status for a Coroot project.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

tools.name: investigate_incident
tools.description: Performs a structured incident investigation using Coroot data and returns an RCA summary plus a machine-readable JSON payload.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

incidentId.description: Identifier of the incident as seen in Coroot. Use ids from the incidents list.

maxWords.description: Upper bound on the length of the natural-language RCA summary.

audience.description: Target audience for the summary, for example 'sre' or 'exec'. Defaults to 'sre'.

includeTraces.description: Whether to include tracing overviews in the analysis.

includeLogs.description: Whether to include log overviews in the analysis.

includeCosts.description: Whether to include costs overview in the analysis.

includeRisks.description: Whether to include risk overview in the analysis.

tools.name: get_nodes_overview
tools.description: Returns an overview of node health for a Coroot project, aligned with the Nodes overview in Coroot.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

tools.name: get_service_health
tools.description: Returns a compact health snapshot for a Coroot service, aligned with the Application Health Summary view.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

service.description: Coroot service or application identifier, as shown in the Coroot UI.

tools.name: get_applications_overview
tools.description: Returns an overview of application health for a Coroot project, aligned with the Application Health Summary view.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

tools.name: get_slo_overview
tools.description: Returns an overview of SLO objectives for a Coroot project (availability & latency thresholds per project and app).

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

tools.name: get_application_logs
tools.description: Returns recent log entries for a single Coroot application, summarised for AI-assisted analysis.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

applicationId.description: Coroot application identifier like 'cluster:namespace:Kind:name'. Use ids from application health views.

windowMinutes.description: Time window, in minutes, to retrieve log entries for. Defaults to 30 minutes.

maxEntries.description: Maximum number of log entries to return, capped at 100.

tools.name: get_traces_overview
tools.description: Returns a traces overview for a Coroot project, aligned with the Traces overview in Coroot.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

query.description: Optional trace query string as you would enter it in the Coroot traces overview.

tools.name: get_application_traces
tools.description: Returns recent trace data for a single Coroot application over a bounded time window.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

applicationId.description: Coroot application identifier like 'cluster:namespace:Kind:name'. Use ids from application health views.

windowMinutes.description: Time window, in minutes, to retrieve trace data for. Defaults to 30 minutes.

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: Returns the Coroot projects the current API key can access.

tools.name: get_logs_overview
tools.description: Returns a logs overview for a Coroot project, aligned with the Logs overview in Coroot.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

query.description: Optional log query string as you would enter it in the Coroot logs overview.

tools.name: list_recent_incidents
tools.description: Returns a compact list of recent Coroot incidents suitable for follow-up analysis or selection.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

minimumSeverity.description: Minimum incident severity to include. Defaults to WARNING.

limit.description: Maximum number of incidents to return. Defaults to 10.

tools.name: get_incident_details
tools.description: Returns detailed Coroot incident context, including suspected root cause, affected services, metrics, and timeline.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

incidentId.description: Identifier of the incident as seen in Coroot. Use this when a human references a specific incident.

tools.name: get_risks_overview
tools.description: Returns a summary of risks detected in a Coroot project, including exposure and availability information.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

tools.name: summarize_incident_root_cause
tools.description: Summarizes a Coroot incident and explains the most likely root cause, blast radius, and next steps.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.

incidentId.description: Identifier of the incident as seen in Coroot. Use this when a human references a specific incident.

maxWords.description: Upper bound on the length of the natural-language summary.

includeMetricsTable.description: Whether to include a compact JSON structure with key metrics that the model can render as a table.

tools.name: get_costs_overview
tools.description: Returns a cost overview for a Coroot project, aligned with the Costs overview in Coroot.

projectId.description: Coroot project identifier. Defaults to coroot.default-project-id when omitted.
